properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND USER_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT BOARD_NO) FROM REPLY WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND USER_NO = ?

SELECT BOARD_NO , CNAME , BOARD_TITLE , NICKNAME , CREATE_DATE , COUNT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , BLIST.* FROM(SELECT * FROM BOARD B JOIN CATEGORY USING(CID) JOIN MEMBER M USING (USER_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND USER_NO = ? ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) BLIST) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT BOARD_NO , CNAME , BOARD_TITLE , NICKNAME , CREATE_DATE , COUNT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , BLIST.* FROM(SELECT DISTINCT BOARD_NO , CNAME , BOARD_TITLE , M.NICKNAME , B.CREATE_DATE , COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN CATEGORY USING(CID) JOIN MEMBER M USING (USER_NO) JOIN REPLY R USING(BOARD_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND R.STATUS = 'Y' AND R.USER_NO = ? ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) BLIST) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(S_NO) FROM STUDY WHERE S_STATUS = 'Y' AND USER_NO = ?

SELECT S_NO , CNAME , S_NAME , S_TO , NICKNAME , S_STARTPERIOD , S_ENDPERIOD FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , SLIST.* FROM(SELECT S_NO , CNAME , S_NAME , S_TO , NICKNAME , S_STARTPERIOD , S_ENDPERIOD FROM STUDY S JOIN CATEGORY USING(CID) JOIN MEMBER M USING (USER_NO) WHERE S_STATUS = 'Y' AND USER_NO = ? ORDER BY S_NO DESC) SLIST) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT S_NO , CNAME , S_NAME , S_TO , NICKNAME , S_STARTPERIOD , S_ENDPERIOD FROM (SELECT SLIST.* FROM(SELECT S_NO , CNAME , S_NAME , S_TO , NICKNAME , S_STARTPERIOD , S_ENDPERIOD FROM STUDY S JOIN CATEGORY USING(CID) JOIN MEMBER M USING (USER_NO) JOIN MEMBER_JOINSTUDY MJ USING(S_NO) WHERE S_STATUS = 'Y' AND MJ.USER_NO = ? ORDER BY S_NO DESC) SLIST)
UPDATE STUDY SET S_STATUS = 'N' WHERE S_NO = ? AND USER_NO = ?
DELETE FROM MEMBER_JOINSTUDY WHERE S_NO = ? AND USER_NO = ?

SELECT PRODUCT_NAME , START_DATE , EXPIRATION_DATE , PRODUCT_PRICE FROM (SELECT ILIST.* FROM(SELECT PRODUCT_NAME , START_DATE , P.EXPIRATION_DATE , PRODUCT_PRICE FROM PURCHASE P JOIN PRODUCT USING(PRODUCT_NO) JOIN MEMBER M USING (USER_NO) WHERE USER_NO = ? ORDER BY PURCHASE_NO DESC) ILIST)
INSERT INTO REFUND ( REFUND_NO , REFUND_COIN , REFUND_DATE , BANK_ACCOUNT , BANK_NAME , ACCOUNT_NAME , COMPLETE_DATE , USER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_RNO.NEXTVAL , ? , SYSDATE , ? , ? , ? , NULL , ? )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PURCHASE WHERE USER_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHARGE WHERE USER_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REFUND WHERE COMPLETE_DATE IS NOT NULL AND USER_NO = ?

SELECT PURCHASE_DATE , PRODUCT_NAME , PRODUCT_PRICE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , PLIST.* FROM(SELECT PURCHASE_DATE , PRODUCT_NAME , PRODUCT_PRICE FROM PURCHASE JOIN PRODUCT USING(PRODUCT_NO) WHERE USER_NO = ? ORDER BY PURCHASE_NO DESC) PLIST) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT CHARGE_DATE , CHARGE_COIN FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , CLIST.* FROM(SELECT CHARGE_DATE , CHARGE_COIN FROM CHARGE WHERE USER_NO = ? ORDER BY CHARGE_NO DESC) CLIST) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT REFUND_DATE , REFUND_COIN , COMPLETE_DATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , RLIST.* FROM(SELECT REFUND_DATE , REFUND_COIN , COMPLETE_DATE FROM REFUND WHERE USER_NO = ? ORDER BY REFUND_NO DESC) RLIST) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER_TIMER WHERE SYSDATE BETWEEN (SELECT SYSDATE - 30 FROM DUAL) AND SYSDATE AND USER_NO = ?

SELECT S_DAY , S_TIME FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , RLIST.* FROM(SELECT S_DAY , S_TIME FROM MEMBER_TIMER WHERE USER_NO = ? ORDER BY S_DAY DESC) RLIST) WHERE S_DAY BETWEEN (SELECT SYSDATE - 30 FROM DUAL) AND SYSDATE AND RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT S_TIME FROM MEMBER_TIMER WHERE TO_CHAR(S_DAY) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE) AND USER_NO = ?
SELECT TO_CHAR(SUM(S_TIME) / (COUNT(S_DAY))) FROM MEMBER_TIMER JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE USER_TYPE = 'U' AND USER_NO = ? GROUP BY USER_NO
SELECT TO_CHAR(SUM(S_TIME)) FROM MEMBER_TIMER JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE USER_TYPE = 'U' AND USER_NO = ? GROUP BY USER_NO

SELECT TRUNC(TO_CHAR(SUM(S_TIME)) / (SELECT COUNT(S_DAY) FROM MEMBER_TIMER WHERE S_DAY BETWEEN (SELECT SYSDATE - 30 FROM DUAL) AND SYSDATE AND USER_NO = ?)) FROM MEMBER_TIMER JOIN MEMBER USING(USER_NO) WHERE S_DAY BETWEEN (SELECT SYSDATE - 30 FROM DUAL) AND SYSDATE AND USER_TYPE = 'U' AND USER_NO = ? GROUP BY USER_NO
